project.description: Build GTK Pango library, including dependencies

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIBPANGO_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FONTCONFIG_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## DELETE OUTPUT DIRS
# both rm -rf $WORKSPACE/output rm -rf $WORKSPACE/artifacts

## DOWNLOAD AND UNPACK ARTIFACTS CAIRO_ARTIFACT_URL="http://localhost:8080/jenkins/job/libcairo/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact" wget -O $WORKSPACE/libcairo.artifact.tar.xz $CAIRO_ARTIFACT_URL/libcairo.artifact.tar.xz mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/artifacts cd $WORKSPACE/artifacts tar -Jxvf $WORKSPACE/libcairo.artifact.tar.xz

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE FONTCONFIG
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d fontconfig-${_FONTCONFIG_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf fontconfig-${_FONTCONFIG_VERSION} fi
tar -jxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$FONTCONFIG_TARBALL
cd fontconfig-${_FONTCONFIG_VERSION}
# now run Configure ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/output
## BUILD AND TEST FONTCONFIG cd fontconfig-${_FONTCONFIG_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE LIBPANGO
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d pango-${_LIBPANGO_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf pango-${_LIBPANGO_VERSION} fi
# -J == xz compression tar -Jxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$LIBPANGO_TARBALL
cd pango-${_LIBPANGO_VERSION}
# now run Configure PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/lib/pkgconfig \ ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/output
## BUILD AND TEST LIBPANGO cd pango-${_LIBPANGO_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## ARCHIVE BINARY BUILDS # -J == xz compression
ARTIFACT_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y.%j-%H:%m) cd $WORKSPACE/output touch libpango-${_LIBPANGO_VERSION}.${ARTIFACT_TIMESTAMP} touch fontconfig-${_FONTCONFIG_VERSION}.${ARTIFACT_TIMESTAMP} tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libpango.artifact.tar.xz .
